name: Airport Catcher Simulator
description:
In a perfect normal world, someone made an airport to catch airplanes. Why? Well, that’s not to question to be asked, but instead, ask yourself: why not?

ATENTION: The game is under development! Version 0.0003

The game is being made for the Useless Simulation Jam (link).

 

Not implemented yet:

Sounds.

Polish.

 

How to play: with mouse. 

In game have the complete how to play!
